name: Puffballs
description:
Bring balance to the world by carefully positioning puffballs.

Puffballs are adorable creatures that multiply uncontrollably. Different puffballs have different abilities and different ways of reproduction. If you're not careful, things can quickly get out of control, and you will find yourself amidst a swarm of puffballs!

Play in fullscreen for the best experience. Left mouse button is all you need. Have fun!
